fact: Some digital art files are larger than entire video games.
Digital art democratizes global art access.
Augmented Reality (AR) blends digital art with reality.
Generative art uses algorithms to create visuals.
Digital art is often interactive and immersive.
VR allows deep immersion in virtual art worlds.
Glitch aesthetics embrace digital errors as artistic expression.
New tools constantly innovate digital art forms.
Digital art can be easily replicated, but ownership is unique.
Sustainability is a growing focus in digital art.
